body_html:
This is probably caused by the peephole parameter variables being vectors, a limitation of the orthogonal initializer not knowing whether to treat these as row or column vectors.

body:
This is probably caused by the peephole parameter variables being vectors,
a limitation of the orthogonal initializer not knowing whether to treat
these as row or column vectors.

On Jun 8, 2017 8:39 AM, "Michael Isard" <notifications@github.com> wrote:
